channel.title: How do you fire a friend?
channel.description:
Okay well..I have these two friends on Mopar/on my server. How do you go about getting rid of one of them(because they are both at each others neck so you are left to get rid of one of them..) without hurting their feelings/them getting mad at you?
Like...both have been friends since forever <3 So I have no idea how to go on this. I love both of these guys...like brothers in crime if you get my drift. This irritates and frustrates me so much ugh.
Any advice would be lovely.

item.title: How do you fire a friend?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

There’s this new invention, called the PM system.

You should try it out some time :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: How do you fire a friend?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Whoever has the most skills, helps out the most or will help out the most (in the future) is the one you should keep. If they are both as “good” as you say they are then just get rid of one. You may need their skills in the future.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you fire a friend?

item.title: How do you fire a friend?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:423883”]Tell them they aren’t needed anymore, but don’t say it straight out like ‘Your useless. Get out of my server.’ Say it more like ‘I’ve been thinking to myself blah and don’t think your assistance is required anymore. Thanks though.’

Are you trying to get rid of completely or just demote them?[/quote]well as they both are developers and have both contributed if i was to demote them they would probs quit so get rid of I suppose :o

Read full topic
item.source: How do you fire a friend?

item.title: How do you fire a friend?
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Let them down nicely, let them know that you are still their friend, this just won’t work out. Let them know even though you like them, the behavior could not go on, and you had to let go of them for those reasons. You are only firing them because you are their boss, and as a boss you have to do your duty and cannot let personal feelings get in the way.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you fire a friend?

item.title: How do you fire a friend?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Tell them they aren’t needed anymore, but don’t say it straight out like ‘Your useless. Get out of my server.’ Say it more like ‘I’ve been thinking to myself blah and don’t think your assistance is required anymore. Thanks though.’

Are you trying to get rid of completely or just demote them?

Read full topic
